title: Mithali Raj Joins Sachin In Completing 20 Years In Cricket, Creates History
text:
1 of 8

Mithali Raj can't stop creating records. The Indian women's ODI captain became the first female player to complete 20 years in international cricket when her side took on South Africa in Vadodara yesterday. Raj began her career against Ireland at the age of 16 back in June 1999 and since then has become India's most reliable player. Among cricketers, only Sachin Tendulkar, Sanath Jayasuriya, and Javed Miandad have had careers longer than hers. It's been an amazing journey for the Indian superstar and let's take a quick look at the milestones she’s toppled over in the last 20 years.
description: The Indian women's ODI captain became the first female player to complete 20 years in international cricket when her side took on South Africa in Vadodara yesterday.
